articles.description: Lionel Messi signs off from potentially his final game on the global stage with a heavy defeat - but he still shows some magic touches.
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Was that Inter Miami forward's final game on global stage?

articles.description: Wales scrum-half Tomos Williams has been ruled out of the rest of the British and Irish Lions tour of Australia with a hamstring injury
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Tomos Williams ruled out of tour with Ben White called up

articles.description: Everything you need to know about day one as Wimbledon gets under way, with a strong British presence in the men's and women's singles.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Emma Raducanu, Carlos Alcaraz, Katie Boulter and Aryna Sabalenka in action on day one

articles.title: Lionesses: What are main questions facing England boss Sarina Wiegman before Euro 2025?

articles.description: Lando Norris says his victory in the Austrian Grand Prix was "fulfilling" as he heads into his home race next weekend.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lando Norris says win 'gives me good confidence' before Silverstone

articles.description: Maro Itoje will return as captain in the British and Irish Lions team to face the Queensland Reds at the Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane on Wednesday.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Mari Itoje returns as captain to face Queensland Reds

articles.title: Lauren James returns for England side as boost for Euro 2025

articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers legend LeBron James is set to play in a record 23rd NBA season after his agent said the 40-year-old has exercised an option to extend his contract.
articles.title: Lebron James: NBA legend extends Los Angeles Lakers stay for record 23rd season

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr will fight fellow Briton Conor Benn in a rematch in London in September.
